data.title: Good food
data.text: The food was very good and the service was great. The food was professionally cooked to order!! Will be back again

data.title: I love the big menu
data.text: Marko's has the best chicken salad sandwiches in America.  Their chicken noodle soup is to die for.  Want a good meal without having to ransom your children?  Go to Marko's

data.title: Gem of a Find!
data.text:
We were looking for a quick , basic place for lunch about an hour and a half from home.
We found a popular neighborhood dining place. It is a cozy cafe with booths in front and tables in the back.
The menu is large and varied. There are specials every day. My husband had one of those specials. It was a chicken salad sandwich with more chicken salad than I've ever seen at any other restaurant. It included a cup of soup.
I had a chicken pita, again the pita  was stuffed with more chicken than I've ever had anywhere else. I chose rice pilaf as the side.
The cafe was humming with diners. The staff is friendly and attentive. Service was great. It was our first time there,but we were treated like regulars.
We'll be back!

data.title: Cozy is Right!
data.text: This restaurant was recommended to us for breakfast by a relative.  There was a line when we arrived on a Sunday morning but we were able to get a table for two right away.  We met a very nice couple sitting at the next table - couldn't help it since they were so close (it's called cozy for a reason).  I ordered a Greek omelet (gyro lamb, spinach, and feta cheese) and my wife got hash browns with onions.  The only disappointment was no fresh fruit whatsoever on the menu.  Other than that the price was right and the service was excellent.

data.title: Great Breakfast
data.text: if you want a great breakfast this is the place. Good Omelets too.Had a cornbread sandwich, it was great to.

data.title: Cozy and Reasonable
data.text: Service was very attentive from the moment we stepped in the door until we left. We had breakfast. My 11 year old had a full stack of silver dollar pancakes and my younger daughter had the half stack. I ordered the super special which included 2 eggs, 2 pancakes, and 4 slices of bacon. Our bill plus tip was under 20 bucks.
